languages.text: {n}Равор мрачно глядит на труп:{/n} "Что ж, Лорд-капитан, постараюсь найти замену бедолаге. Надеюсь, на нового человека ваш законник не взъестся".
{n}Ravor looks grimly at the body.{/n} "Well, Lord Cap'n, I'll try to find a replacement for the poor sod. I hope your lawman doesn't go after the next one."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор мрачно глядит на труп:{/n} "Что ж, Лорд-капитан, постараюсь найти замену бедолаге. Надеюсь, на нового человека ваш законник не взъестся".

{n}Ravor looks grimly at the body.{/n} "Well, Lord Cap'n, I'll try to find a replacement for the poor sod. I hope your lawman doesn't go after the next one."

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは苦々しい表情で死体を見た。{/n}「さて、ロード・キャプテン…この哀れな奴の代わりを探してみますよ。次の奴が、あなたの法執行官に狙われなきゃいいんですがね」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks grimly at the body.{/n} "Well, Lord Cap'n, I'll try to find a replacement for the poor sod. I hope your lawman doesn't go after the next one."

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは苦々しい表情で死体を見た。{/n}「さて、ロード・キャプテン…この哀れな奴の代わりを探してみますよ。次の奴が、あなたの法執行官に狙われなきゃいいんですがね」

languages.text: {n}Ravor, sert bir yüz ifadesiyle cesede bakıyor.{/n} "Madem öyle, zavallı herifin yerine başka birini bulmaya çalışacağım Lord Kaptan. Dilerim ki kanuncunuz onun da peşine düşmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks grimly at the body.{/n} "Well, Lord Cap'n, I'll try to find a replacement for the poor sod. I hope your lawman doesn't go after the next one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor, sert bir yüz ifadesiyle cesede bakmaktadır.{/n} "Madem öyle, zavallı herifin yerine başka birini bulmaya çalışacağım Lord Kaptan. Dilerim ki kanun adamınız onun da peşine düşmez."

languages.text: {n}Ravor mira sombrío el cadáver.{/n} «Bueno, Lord Capitán. Tendré que buscar suplente para el desgraciado. A ver si este no se gana la ira de su agente de la ley».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks grimly at the body.{/n} "Well, Lord Cap'n, I'll try to find a replacement for the poor sod. I hope your lawman doesn't go after the next one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor mira sombrío el cadáver.{/n} «Bueno, Lord Capitán. Tendré que buscar suplente para el desgraciado. A ver si este no se gana la ira de su agente de la ley».

languages.text: {n}雷沃面色阴沉地看着船员的尸体。{/n}“行吧，船长老大，我会想办法找个人来代替这个可怜的家伙。我只希望你的法务官别再去找下一个人的麻烦。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks grimly at the body.{/n} "Well, Lord Cap'n, I'll try to find a replacement for the poor sod. I hope your lawman doesn't go after the next one."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃面色阴沉地看着船员的尸体。{/n}“行吧，船长老大，我会想办法找个人来代替这个可怜的家伙。我只希望你的法务官别再去找下一个人的麻烦。”

languages.text: {n}Ravor observe le cadavre d'un air las.{/n} « Bon, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}, je vais tenter de lui trouver un remplaçant. J'espère que votre justicier ne trouvera rien à redire sur le prochain. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks grimly at the body.{/n} "Well, Lord Cap'n, I'll try to find a replacement for the poor sod. I hope your lawman doesn't go after the next one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor observe le cadavre d'un air las.{/n} « Bon, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}, je vais tenter de lui trouver un remplaçant. J'espère que votre justicier ne trouvera rien à redire sur le prochain. »

languages.text: {n}Ravor betrachtet mit düsterer Miene die Leiche.{/n} "Tja, Lord Cap'n, ich werde versuchen, Ersatz für diesen armen Kerl zu finden. Ich hoffe, Euer Gesetzeshüter lässt seinen Nachfolger in Ruhe."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks grimly at the body.{/n} "Well, Lord Cap'n, I'll try to find a replacement for the poor sod. I hope your lawman doesn't go after the next one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor betrachtet mit düsterer Miene die Leiche.{/n} "Tja, Lord Cap'n, ich werde versuchen, Ersatz für diesen armen Kerl zu finden. Ich hoffe, Euer Gesetzeshüter lässt seinen Nachfolger in Ruhe."
